content.question: Which of the following best describes the most significant effect during the Napoleonic Wars of the ideas expressed in the passage?

choices.label: They made Spaniards more willing to embrace the Enlightenment principles embodied in Napoleon’s policies.
They made Spaniards more determined to fight for the preservation of their colonial empire in the Americas.
They strengthened Spaniards’ nationalist resistance against the perceived illegitimacy of Napoleon’s rule.
They convinced Spaniards that their country needed to overthrow its monarchy and establish a republican government.

content.answer: They strengthened Spaniards’ nationalist resistance against the perceived illegitimacy of Napoleon’s rule.
